show.subtitle: Charlene Spretnak and her guests track the progress of the “Big Make-over,” the cultural and political Relational Shift that is occurring in all fields as a result of recent discoveries that life is far more dynamically interrelated than modern societies have realized.
show.title: All Together Now

title: Our Responsibility to Be Optimistic
content:
A talk with Jonathon Porritt, cofounder of Forum for the Future (forumforthefuture.org) in London and former Chair of... <!--more--> the UK Sustainable Development Commission, on the “psychodynamics of optimism in an apocalyptic age” (jonathonporritt.
com); also engaged reflections on the meaning of Advent; poem by Rev.
Alla Renee Bozarth
